page.title: 04School Playground Games
page.content: These are some of the games we play at playtime at Durweston First School. { { Chase:}run away and someone catches you and puts you in jail which is anywhere, until someone frees you. { Stuck in mud:}if you are caught you open your legs and someone goes through. { Knives,forks,spoons:}someone calls a special call and you do a handstand. { Buzzy Bee:}you have run to the middle to get honey. And not get caught. { Hopscotch:}throw a stone to a number marked on the pitch and hop to that number. Then you pick up the stone and hop back to the beginning. { Tyre game:}people stand on the outside of the tyre. Someone pushes you inside the tyre and then you are on it.
